<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bear Hug](/Feats.aspx?ID=5491) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Howl of the Wild](/Sources.aspx?ID=226) pg. 77 <sup>2.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Werecreature](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=225)

**Prerequisites**
[Werecreature Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=5486); werebear

**Requirements**
You’re in bear or hybrid shape, and your last action was a successful claw Strike.

</column>

---

You hug your opponent. You make another claw Strike against the same target. If this Strike hits, the target is [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77) until the end of your next turn, unless you move or your target [Escapes](/Actions.aspx?ID=2296).
name: Bear Hug
requirement: You’re in bear or hybrid shape, and your last action was a successful claw Strike.
